# Data acquisition system metadata element schema

**Description:** Data acquisition system metadata element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

## Power Line Frequency

**Label:** powerLineFrequency

**Description:** Frequency (in Hz) of the power line at the setup location.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** numeric

**Unit of Measure:** Hz

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://www.purl.org/NDDO/NDDO_10000379) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",

      "@type": "xsd:string"

    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"

      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
  },
  "type": "object",
  "title": "powerLineFrequency field schema",
  "description": "powerLineFrequency field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "numeric"

  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": false,
    "numberType": "xsd:decimal",
    "unitOfMeasure": "Hz"
  },
  "properties": {

      "type": [
        "string",

      "format": "uri"

  "required": [
    "@value",

  "schema:description": "Frequency (in Hz) of the power line at the setup location.",
```

## Manufacturer

**Label:** ephysSetupManufacturer

**Description:** Manufacturer of the ephys system (e.g. "OpenEphys”, “Alphaomega",”Blackrock”)

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://schema.org/manufacturer) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",

      "@type": "@id"

      "@type": "@id"
```

**Label:** recordingSetupCustomName

## Sampling Frequency

**Label:** samplingFrequency

**Description:** Internal (maximum) sampling frequency of the AR recording.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** numeric

**Unit of Measure:** Hz

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://schema.org/frequency) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",

      "@type": "xsd:string"

      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"

    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"

      "@type": "@id"

    "requiredValue": false,

      "type": [
```
